origin.poketyped.bugtype.name: Bug type
origin.poketyped.bugtype.description: You know the real strength of the arthropod and became one to wield it.
origin.poketyped.darktype.name: Dark type
origin.poketyped.darktype.description: You opened yourself to the shades and became a child of the night.
origin.poketyped.dragontype.name: Dragon type
origin.poketyped.dragontype.description: People trembles before the might of an ancient dragon.
origin.poketyped.electrictype.name: Electric type
origin.poketyped.electrictype.descriptio: Struck by lightning, you now burst with energy to spend.
origin.poketyped.fairytype.name: Fairy type
origin.poketyped.fairytype.description: The fairies invited you to their realm and you became one of the weird folk.
origin.poketyped.fightingtype.name: Fighting type
origin.poketyped.fightingtype.descriptio: You cultivated your body into a force of nature and exceed human limitations.
origin.poketyped.firetype.name: Fire type
origin.poketyped.firetype.description: You let yourself burn in flammes to bend their destructive power.
origin.poketyped.flyingtype.name: Flying type
origin.poketyped.flyingtype.description: You made sky your domain and now reign over it.
origin.poketyped.ghosttype.name: Ghost type
origin.poketyped.ghosttype.description: You left your fear of death behind to live at the edge of life and death.
origin.poketyped.grasstype.name: Grass type
origin.poketyped.grasstype.description: You learned from plants to thrive in the power of photosynthesis and growth.
origin.poketyped.groundtype.name: Ground type
origin.poketyped.groundtype.description: One with the earth, you're as fast as a seismic wave
origin.poketyped.icetype.name: Ice type
origin.poketyped.icetype.description: Blizzard scares you no more since you became one with the frost.
origin.poketyped.normaltype.name: Normal type
origin.poketyped.normaltype.description: You embrace your humanity and became a master of simplicity.
origin.poketyped.poisontype.name: Poison type
origin.poketyped.poisontype.description: Intoxication became your way to live. But you love it!
origin.poketyped.psychictype.name: Psychic type
origin.poketyped.psychictype.description: You sharpened your wits to the point where your mind's influence surpass your body's.
origin.poketyped.rocktype.name: Rock type
origin.poketyped.rocktype.description: Cut from the purest diamond, you can surpass any difficulties life may throw at you.
origin.poketyped.steeltype.name: Steel type
origin.poketyped.steeltype.description: You are the unbending steel, you are unbreakable.
origin.poketyped.watertype.name: Water type
origin.poketyped.watertype.description: You now understand the knowledge of the depths and became a water folk.
origin.poketyped.poketyped.name: Poketyped
origin.poketyped.poketyped.description: This origin let you harness the power of a single pokemon type, explore the world to find a way to evolve!
power.poketyped.bug/bugbite.name: Bug bite
power.poketyped.bug/bugbite.description: For the next 10 seconds, your next attack will deal more damage and feed you.
power.poketyped.bug/climbing.name: Numb little bug
power.poketyped.bug/climbing.description: You are smaller, have less health and can climb on blocks.
power.poketyped.dark/nightforce.name: Dark dweller
power.poketyped.dark/nightforce.descript: You are stronger during the night and weaker during the day. you have night vision.
power.poketyped.dark/suckerpunch.name: Sucker punch
power.poketyped.dark/suckerpunch.descrip: You brace yourself for a hit. If you are hit within the next 5s, you take less damage, teleport behind your opponent and deal damage to them.
power.poketyped.dragon/dracometeor.name: Dracometeor
power.poketyped.dragon/dracometeor.descr: Strike down your foe with three powerful meteors.
power.poketyped.dragon/dragonsize.name: Dragon sized
power.poketyped.dragon/dragonsize.descri: You are bigger than the average player, and you need to eat more food.
power.poketyped.dragon/pressure.name: Pressure
power.poketyped.dragon/pressure.descript: Mobs around you and players attacking you are inflicted mining fatigue.
power.poketyped.electric/hyperactive.des: You need to eat more often.
power.poketyped.electric/lightningrod.de: Lightning reinforce your strength and speed instead of doing damage.
power.poketyped.electric/quickness.name: Nimble.
power.poketyped.electric/thunder.name: Thunder
power.poketyped.electric/thunder.descrip: Mark a spot, 5 second later, lightning will strike.
power.poketyped.fairy/cutecharm.name: Cute charm
power.poketyped.fairy/cutecharm.descript: Entities attacking you have a 30% chance to get weakness 2 for 5s.
power.poketyped.fairy/mistyterrain.name: Misty terrain
power.poketyped.fairy/mistyterrain.descr: Summon a misty terrain that protect you from negative effects. While in the misty terrain, you can use Moon blast.
power.poketyped.fairy/purity.name: Purity
power.poketyped.fairy/purity.description: You are weak to poison and wither effect.
power.poketyped.fairy/moonblast.name: Moonblast
power.poketyped.fairy/moonblast.descript: Shoot a projectile that apply weakness on the target.
power.poketyped.fighting/circlethrow.des: Inflict heavy knockback to your opponent.
power.poketyped.fighting/closecombat.des: Enter a fighting stance. Your next five weaponless hit will deal 7 damage. Upon hitting all attacks, this power becomes circle throw.
power.poketyped.fighting/fightersize.des: You are bigger than the average player. Your punches deals more damage.
power.poketyped.fighting/lowsweep.name: Low sweep
power.poketyped.fighting/machpunch.name: Mach punch
power.poketyped.fighting/machpunch.descr: Lunge forward and deal damage to the first enemy hit. If the attack is successful, your next attack become low sweep.
power.poketyped.fighting/slowstrike.name: Punch out
power.poketyped.fighting/slowstrike.desc: Favoring the art of the punch, you are slower with a weapon.
power.poketyped.fire/fireimmunity.name: Fire Immunity
power.poketyped.fire/fireimmunity.descri: Forged in crimson, fire and lava does not damage you.
power.poketyped.fire/flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
power.poketyped.fire/flamethrower.descri: Charge fire energy over time and launch it on command.
power.poketyped.fire/hydrophobia.name: Hydrophobia
power.poketyped.flying/acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
power.poketyped.flying/acrobatics.descri: Lunge forward and deal damage. This power becomes stronger the lighter you are.
power.poketyped.flying/brittlebones.name: Brittle bones
power.poketyped.flying/brittlebones.desc: You take more damage from fall and kinetic energy.
power.poketyped.flying/claustrophobia.de: You are weakened in closed spaces.
power.poketyped.flying/winged.name: Winged
power.poketyped.flying/winged.descriptio: You can fly as if you were wearing elytra. You can't do it if you are wearing a chestplate.
power.poketyped.ghost/preying.name: It's time to prey
power.poketyped.ghost/preying.descriptio: Entities with low health will be revealed to you, killing them fill your revenant gauge.
power.poketyped.ghost/revenantkey.name: Revenant
power.poketyped.ghost/revenantkey.descri: You turn invisible and intangible, while in this state, your spirit gauge is consumed.
power.poketyped.ghost/undead.name: Kinda undead
power.poketyped.ghost/undead.description: You take more damage from smite and don't have any natural regeneration.
power.poketyped.grass/chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
power.poketyped.grass/chlorophyll.descri: You walk and hit faster under the sun.
power.poketyped.grass/fireweakness.name: Plant skin
power.poketyped.grass/fireweakness.descr: You make good kindling, fire deals more damage.
power.poketyped.grass/gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
power.poketyped.grass/gigadrain.descript: Absorb the life of your foe.
power.poketyped.ground/depthpower.name: Power of the depth
power.poketyped.ground/digkey.name: Dig
power.poketyped.ground/digkey.descriptio: You can walk through dirt and stone, gaining strength in the process.
power.poketyped.ground/vertigo.name: Vertigo
power.poketyped.ground/vertigo.descripti: When in altitude, you are weaker.
power.poketyped.ice/blizzard.name: Blizzard
power.poketyped.ice/blizzard.description: Freeze people in a area around you, this power last as long you are applying the freeze effect.
power.poketyped.ice/chillingtouch.name: Chilling touch
power.poketyped.ice/chillingtouch.descri: Your melee attack slow down your enemies.
power.poketyped.ice/melting.name: Melting
power.poketyped.ice/melting.description: You are slowed down in hot biomes.
power.poketyped.ice/slushrush.name: Slush rush
power.poketyped.ice/slushrush.descriptio: You are immune to freezing effect and get faster while in snow powder.
power.poketyped.normal/perfectbalance.de: You are immune to the weakness and strength effect.
power.poketyped.normal/protect.name: Protect
power.poketyped.normal/villagerfriend.de: You can fit anywhere, thus, villager likes you.
power.poketyped.poison/corrupted.name: Corrupted
power.poketyped.poison/corrupted.descrip: You are immune to poison, regeneration, speed and strength.
power.poketyped.poison/poisontouch.name: Poison touch
power.poketyped.poison/poisontouch.descr: You have 30% chance to apply poison on hit.
power.poketyped.poison/venoshock.name: Venoshock
power.poketyped.psychic/extrasensory.des: Throw your enemy in the air.
power.poketyped.psychic/powerswap.name: Many powers
power.poketyped.psychic/powerswap.descri: You can swap between three power.
power.poketyped.psychic/psyshock.name: Psyshock
power.poketyped.psychic/psyshock.descrip: Throw a random item that deal damage.
power.poketyped.psychic/teleport.name: Teleport
power.poketyped.psychic/weak.name: All in the mind
power.poketyped.rock/broken.name: Broken
power.poketyped.rock/broken.description: While your sturdy ability is on cooldown, you are weakened.
power.poketyped.rock/stealthrock.name: Stealth rock
power.poketyped.rock/stealthrock.descrip: Drop rocks around you that deal damage to foes walking on it.
power.poketyped.rock/sturdy.name: Sturdy
power.poketyped.rock/sturdy.description: You can't be one-shoted. If this power actives, it goes on cooldown.
power.poketyped.steel/heavy.name: Heavy
power.poketyped.steel/heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
power.poketyped.steel/heavyslam.descript: Jump and then slam the ground. During the fall, you take no damage.
power.poketyped.steel/irondefense.name: Iron defense
power.poketyped.water/aquatic.name: Sea dweller
power.poketyped.water/aquatic.descriptio: Bound to the ocean, you have water breathing and water vision.
power.poketyped.water/dryfish.name: Dry fish
power.poketyped.water/dryfish.descriptio: You are slowed while out of the water.
power.poketyped.water/surf.name: Surf
power.poketyped.water/surf.description: Dive forward and gain swimspeed. Dryfish does not trigger during the effect.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getbug.name: Bug type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getbug.descri: In their nest, a rotten eye you shall throw.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getdark.name: Dark type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getdark.descr: In the deepest shades, darkness you shall take.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getdragon.des: Your enemy's child, you shall broom.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getelectric.d: In the eye of the storm, bring the thunder.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getfairy.name: Fairy type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getfairy.desc: To the fair folk, a revivifying bloom you shall gift.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getfighting.d: From your hand, blood will be shed.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getfire.name: Fire type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getfire.descr: With the orange gem, you shall bathe in flames.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getghost.name: Ghost type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getghost.desc: Burning souls and dead laments will lead you on your path.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getgrass.name: Grass type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getgrass.desc: Deep in the forest, the mark of the leaf you shall find.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getice.name: Ice type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getice.descri: The coldest ice, to it's home you shall return.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getnormal.des: Like a disease, glitter you shall cleanse.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getpoison.des: The white death you shall face.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getpsychic.de: Stars and dawn, in your rest shall meet.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getrock.name: Rock type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getrock.descr: To a birthing crystal, the precious gem you shall gave.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getsteel.name: Steel type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getsteel.desc: Like the metal, you shall forge yourself.
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getwater.name: Water type
power.poketyped.typeobtain/getwater.desc: In the depth, the blue jewel you shall embrace.
